author: curcuru
msg: Add in original formatting and minor text tweaks; correct one of my links

author: sandygao
msg: JIRA Issue #1478: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1478. Bug fix: in checking wildcard-wildcard collision in UPA, the schema 1.1 path was incorrect. Fixed it to align with the 1.0 path. Now since they are the same, moved the overlapUPA() method back to the base class.

author: sandygao
msg: JIRA Issue #1479: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1479. Bug fix: in checking element-element collision in schema 1.1 UPA, need to make sure the 2 element's substitution groups don't overlap, because the same element can have multiple substitution affiliations. e.g. if "e" substitutes both "a" and "b", then (a|b) should be marked as UPA violation.
